sentence_zh_TW: 棒球是一項在美國非常受歡迎的運動，吸引了數以百萬計的粉絲。
sentence: _______ is a sport that is very popular in the United States, attracting millions of fans.

sentence_zh_TW: 去國外旅行可以讓你體驗不同的文化和生活方式，這是一種拓寬視野的好方法。
sentence: Traveling ______ can allow you to experience different cultures and lifestyles, which is a great way to broaden your perspective.

sentence_zh_TW: 她從十六歲起就學習駕駛，所以她對於開車非常熟練。
sentence: She has been learning to ______ since she was sixteen, so she is very skilled at driving.

sentence_zh_TW: 這件衣服比我想要的還要短，所以我打算不買了。
sentence: This dress is even ______ than I wanted, so I plan not to buy it.

sentence_zh_TW: 火車幾乎是準時的，只晚了兩分鐘就抵達了車站。
sentence: The train was almost on time, arriving just two ______ late at the station.

sentence_zh_TW: 請在你完成作業後，立即發送你的文件給我，以便我能及時檢查。
sentence: Please ______ your document to me as soon as you finish your assignment so that I can check it on time.

sentence_zh_TW: 在寒冷的日子裡，穿上厚厚的夾克很重要，這樣才能保持溫暖。
sentence: It's important to wear a thick ______ on cold days to keep warm.

sentence_zh_TW: 她是一位優秀的家庭主婦，總是將家裡打理得井井有條。
sentence: She is an excellent ______, always keeping the house in order.

sentence_zh_TW: 在動物園裡，孩子們特別喜歡看熊，因為它們既巨大又可愛。
sentence: At the zoo, the children particularly love watching the ______ because they are both huge and cute.

sentence_zh_TW: 在夏天，許多人喜歡去海灘享受陽光和涼爽的海水，讓自己放鬆。
sentence: In the summer, many people enjoy going to the ______ to soak up the sun and cool off in the water.

sentence_zh_TW: 在編程過程中，發生錯誤是非常普遍的，重要的是懂得如何修正它們。
sentence: It is very common to encounter an ______ during the programming process, and it's important to know how to fix them.

sentence_zh_TW: 所有的會議都是在整點舉行，比如三點鐘或四點鐘開始。
sentence: All meetings are held on the hour, such as at three ______ or four ______.

sentence_zh_TW: 聽音樂時，確保音量不會太高，以免損害你的耳朵。
sentence: When listening to music, make sure the volume is not too high to protect your ______.

sentence_zh_TW: 這隻小狗太可愛了，它的毛茸茸的樣子讓每個人都想摸摸它。
sentence: This puppy is so ______ that everyone wants to pet its fluffy little body.

sentence_zh_TW: 為了保持漂亮的形象，很多人會定期修剪頭髮，并保持髮質良好。
sentence: To maintain a beautiful appearance, many people regularly trim their ______ and keep it healthy.

sentence_zh_TW: 在城市的繁忙街道上，人流熙熙攘攘，讓整個氛圍生機勃勃。
sentence: On the busy streets of the city, the ______ bustling with activity create a lively atmosphere.

sentence_zh_TW: 在學校裡，學生們需要學習如何正確使用各種文具，包括鉛筆和紙。
sentence: In school, students need to learn how to properly use various stationery, including pencils and ______.

sentence_zh_TW: 南太平洋有許多美麗的島嶼，其中一些甚至還有獨特的文化和生態系統。
sentence: The South Pacific has many beautiful ______, some of which even have unique cultures and ecosystems.

sentence_zh_TW: 很多人每天早上都會看報紙，以便了解當前的新聞和事件。

sentence_zh_TW: 在完成這個項目之前，我們需要確定我們要做的所有重要任務和步驟。
sentence: Before we finish this project, we need to determine what all the important tasks and steps we need to ______ are.
